intro: Epidendrum mixtoides, commonly known as the Showy Epidendrum, is a tropical orchid native to Central and South America. It is characterized by its striking, showy flowers that range in color from white to pink and violet, often with a contrasting lip. The plant typically grows as an epiphyte, attaching itself to trees and other surfaces in its natural habitat.
